column8: 1. To derive the product category from Product Hierarchy: Use the Product Hierarchy number in MARA-PRDHA. Take the first 4 characters; look up this code in T179T (PRODH field); and use the corresponding VTEXT value as the color description.
column22: Product HierarchyMM: This field is a numeric field in SAP. Lookup requriedJohny & Jonathan: This fields comes in from SAP by querying  MARA - PRDHA 16 digit string and looking up in T179T to get the description. Manually maintained in IBP

column8: 1. To derive the category Type  from Product Hierarchy: Use the Product Hierarchy number in MARA-PRDHA. Take the first 6 characters; look up this code in T179T (PRODH field); and use the corresponding VTEXT value as the color description.
column22: Product HierarchyJohny & Jonathan: This fields comes in from SAP by querying  MARA - PRDHA 16 digit string and looking up in T179T to get the description. Manually maintained in IBP

column8: 1. To derive the product Type from Product Hierarchy: Use the Product Hierarchy number in MARA-PRDHA. Take the first 9 characters; look up this code in T179T (PRODH field); and use the corresponding VTEXT value as the color description.
column22: Product HierarchyJohny & Jonathan: This fields comes in from SAP by querying  MARA - PRDHA 16 digit string and looking up in T179T to get the description. Manually maintained in IBP

column8: 1. To derive the Master SKU Desc from Product Hierarchy: Use the Product Hierarchy number in MARA-PRDHA. Take the first 12 characters; look up this code in T179T (PRODH field); and use the corresponding VTEXT value as the color description.

column8: 1. To derive the Color from Product Hierarchy: Use the Product Hierarchy number in MARA-PRDHA. Take the first 14 characters; look up this code in T179T (PRODH field); and use the corresponding VTEXT value as the color description.
